content: त्रय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Triple, threefold, treble, divided into three parts, of three kinds; त्रयी वै विद्या ऋचो यजूंषि सामानि <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 23.</ls> --यं A triad, a group or collection of three; अदेयमासीत्वयमेव भूपतेः शशिप्रभं छत्रमुभे च चामरे <ls>R. 3. 16</ls>; लोकत्रयं <ls>Bg. 11. 20</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 11.">43</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 76.</ls>

त्रयी {@--1@} The three Vedas taken collectively (ऋग्यजुःसामानि); त्रयी मयाय त्रिगुणात्मने नमः <ls>K. 1</ls>; तौ त्रयी वर्जमितरा विद्याः परिपाठितौ <ls>U. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 125.</ls> {@--2@} A triad, triplet; व्यद्योतिष्ट सभावेद्यामसौ नरशिखित्रयी <ls>Śi. 2. 3.</ls> {@--3@} A matron or married woman whose husband and children are living. {@--4@} Intellect, understanding.
